name: Stobor
text: To a good approximation, you can't style comboboxes at all; they're not "real" browser objects. See here for more explanation, and a possible workaround: Alternatively, if you just want to put borders on it, wrap it in a span, and border that. with span.disabled-select { border: 1px solid red; } Most other properties, like color, etc, probably won't have an effect, though.
